name: Caveman Stories
description: In Caveman Stories you control a caveman who, at the beginning of an ice age, got lost from his tribe and now must fight to survive and find a way back home. Face large and powerful enemies, survive the frosty nights by building shelters and try to unravel the plot behind the extreme cold.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or superior Processor: Intel Core I3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 640 or superior Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: None
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or superior Processor: Intel Core I5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 960 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: None
